content:
Colonel Natalia Humeniuk spoke spokeswoman for the South Defense Forces about the situation with mobilization to the Russian occupation army after Putin's so -called elections in the Russian Federation.

Nataliya Gumeniuk provided her comments during thelive broadcastOn March 28, 2024 on March 28, 2024.

“They now have such a more or less measured mode of operation. They are inventory of those data that have been able to obtain within the "election campaign", that is, we check the lists, " - said the spokeswoman for the South Defense Forces.

According to her, the invaders find in these lists of people who are approached by age and article under the military.

"Who can replenish the units of the so-called territorial defense, and then, after additional training, move to the regular army," said Nataliya Humeniuk.

As reported by the Armyinform, in January 2024 GURtoldHow many people Russia can call daily.
title: The defense forces commented on the mobilization of the invaders after Putin's "elections"
description: Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments during a live broadcast in the Uniform News TV.
author: Army Inform
